==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{af|de|Woche|-n-|Ende}}, {{calque|de|en|nocap=1|weekend}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvɔχn̩ˌʔɛndə/}} * {{audio|de|De-Wochenende.ogg}} * {{a|Austria}} {{audio|de|De-at-Wochenende.ogg}} * {{hyphenation|de|Wo|chen|en|de}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||Wochenenden}} # [[weekend]] {{gloss|break in the working week, usually Saturday and Sunday}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|n}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * {{R:DWDS}} [[Category:de:Calendar terms]]
